entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 5:07 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
